    Attribute based access control. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attribute-based_access_control)

    Zoltan Farkas

    • Method Detail

      • canAccess

        boolean canAccess(Principal user,
                  Properties resource,
                  Properties action,
                  Properties env)
        Attribute bases access control, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attribute-based_access_control
        Parameters:
        user - the user requesting access.
        resource - the properties of the accessed resource.
        action - the properties of the action attempted.
        env - environment params.
        Returns:
